column2: With this top hat, you will definitely attract attention to yourself!
With this top hat, you will definitely attract attention to yourself! Who cares if the hat is dyed with toxic substances, right?
This hat guarantees you an explosion of popularity!
NOT guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin!
Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin.
Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin. Certificate of authenticity included.
Ye will ne'er find one like it anywheres, and all that gazes upon ye will see that yer an Admiral of the Pirate Navy!

While this crown is not fashioned out of the noblest of materials, the craftsmanship is excellent. It is decorated with filigree in geometrical patterns, enhanced with pieces of silver.
This silver crown is decorated with engravings depicting the [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s and decorated with fine pieces of amber.
This golden masterpiece is decorated with filigree leaves and vines. A dozen gleaming crows with amber eyes are perched along the top, their wings spread out as if they are about to take flight.
The hooped crown is made from gold and decorated with foreign precious stones – emeralds, rubies, sapphires and diamonds – the finest ones the size of quails eggs.

Long ago, a great conclave of mage-smiths convened during a blizzard to channel their collective energy into a single artifact, forging a powerful ring that bestowed upon the wielder mastery over all of the elements.
Kids love this strange plushy. Adults, however, think it's creepy.

During the raid, your subordinates found a strange chest and delivered it to you. Judging by its appearance, it may contain treasures... or not. Who knows what this chest may contain?
[GetCraftsmanJob] has arrived at the court and is waiting to hear your wishes on how to improve the [GetMarketArtifactName].

[GetCraftsmanJob] came to your royal court. However, this is not the person you assigned to improve [GetMarketArtifactName]. The half-naked [GetCraftsmanJob] claims to have been robbed by the adventurer on the way here. The description of the adventurer reminds your trusted people of the [GetCraftsmanJob]’s appearance, whom you have appointed to improve the [GetMarketArtifactName]...

You waited for a long time, but [GetCraftsmanJob], whom you appointed to improve the [GetMarketArtifactName], did not come. From your trusted people, you hear that local populations are worried that a [GetCraftsmanJob], carrying an [GetMarketArtifactName], was recently killed and looted by an adventurer.
In the process of improving the [GetMarketArtifactName], the [GetCraftsmanJob] made a mistake and failed to improve it! Fortunately, he returned the artifact to its original state.

In the process of improving the [GetMarketArtifactName], the [GetCraftsmanJob] made a terrible mistake that cannot be undone and failed to improve your [GetMarketArtifactName]! Now this [GetMarketArtifactName] cannot be improved!
[GetCraftsmanJob] worked hard and successfully improved your [GetMarketArtifactName].
Your servant has successfully bought a [GetMarketArtifactName] from [GetCraftsmanJob] for you.
Your servant used your money to flee from your realm.

You waited for a long time, but the servant whom you sent to the market did not return. From your trusted people, you hear that the local community is worried that a certain person who bought a [GetMarketArtifactName] from a [GetCraftsmanJob] was recently killed and looted by an adventurer.
This artifact has been damaged and therefore cannot be improved.
